page.title: 19A Child's Day
page.content: I get up at 7.15 am. I get dressed and make my bed and go downstairs and lay the table. After breakfast I do the washing up. I walk to school. We have assembly at 9.00. At 10.40 we have our first break which ends at 10.55. After Mathematics before break, we have English afterwards. At 12.10 we have dinner break. If it is wet we have sandwiches inside and we have to wait to get in the hall. If it is dry we have sandwiches outside.In the afternoon we do all sorts of things. On Mondays we have Games, on Tuesdays we have Art and Craft and on Fridays we work on our topics.We have swimming after last break and we go in the pool in two groups because there are 34 of us in the class. At 2.30 we have our afternoon break and school ends at 3.15. At home I have a hot meal, watch T.V., and go to bed at 9.00 pm.
